name: Zhonya’s Hourglass
rules_text:
Hidden (Hide now for recycle 1 to react with later for 0.)
The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Recall that unit exhausted. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

params.summary: Hide now for recycle 1 to react with later for 0. The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Recall that unit exhausted.
